summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CraftForge multi-tenant SaaS application with new setup wizard, extended company info, phone formatting, dark mode, and Turkish Lira formatting features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% pass rate). Frontend registration and setup wizard flow working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Login sessions may not persist properly between page reloads

passed_tests: User registration with tenant creation (✅ Working)
Setup wizard redirect after registration (✅ Working)
Backend API endpoints (26/26 tests passed - 100%)
Tenant CRUD operations with new fields (city, district, address, contact_email, phone, tax_office, tax_number)
Setup wizard completion flow and step navigation
Default groups and subtasks creation
Work items CRUD operations
Roles and permissions system
Dashboard statistics endpoint
Phone number formatting (0 (xxx) xxx xx xx format working)
Tax number formatting (10-11 digit validation)
City/District dynamic selection (Istanbul -> Kadıköy tested)
Tax office selection based on city
Setup wizard step-by-step navigation (4 steps working)
Company information form validation
Registration form with all required fields (Firma Adı, Adınız Soyadınız, E-posta, Şifre, Şifre Tekrar)
Frontend routing and navigation
Theme context and toggle button implementation
Setup settings page structure and data population
Turkish language support throughout the application

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality working, minor session management issues)
